chat_history.message:
Hello,

My Galaxy Note20 5G is having the following issue:

The phone won't detect the SIM card and I have no network connection. The phone has been turned off and on, settings updated, and even restored to factory settings. I've also tried a different SIM card, but nothing changed. I do have network access on other phones with the same SIM card, so the problem is with the phone.

I tested different SIM cards from multiple operators and still had the same issue.

Thank you for your help,

Once the package is received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 working days to process a refund (if eligible).

A return is considered complete when the customer has met all of the following conditions:
✔ Confirms that the product was not repaired by someone else and has not been damaged due to a fall or exposure to water.
✔ Confirms that personal data has been deleted.
✔ Has confirmed having the return label.
✔ Understands that they must include accessories and proof of purchase in their package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Reminder: Once received, the seller has 3 working days (5 if it's a laptop or household appliance) to replace or repair your product. Alternatively, they have 2 working days to process a refund (if eligible).

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
L’article est verrouillé par un code ou un schéma de déverrouillage.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

The phone is locked with a code. Kindly assist the customer in unlocking their device otherwise we are unable to proceed with the repair. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Hi ecomobile,

Follow the factory reset procedure to delete the customer's data from the phone. You are not responsible for the fact that the customer has left their data on the phone.

The only purpose of this procedure is to save you time and avoid return postage costs.

We thank you for your cooperation and wish you a good day.

Thank you for your collaboration,

Kouassi Jean-Luc from Back Market

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Dear ecomobile

Thanks for your cooperation.

Regards,
Kouassi Jean-Luc from the Back Care Team

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair, the 07/06/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without an answer with a valid tracking link before the 14/06/2024we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Kouassi Jean-Luc from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
